abstract: Executives at Britain's biggest companies received an average pay increase of 49 percent this year, with compensation rising fast than companies' shares.
snippet: Executives at Britain's biggest companies received an average pay increase of 49 percent this year, with compensation rising fast than companies' shares.
lead_paragraph: LONDON -- Executives at Britain's biggest companies received an average pay increase of 49 percent this year, with compensation rising faster than companies' shares.

headline.main: Executive Pay Rises 49% at British Companies
